00033 
00036     struct GeometryData {
00038         unsigned short numVertices;
00040         bool hasNormals;
00042         unsigned short numTexCoords;
00044         unsigned short numTexCoordDimensions[OGRE_MAX_TEXTURE_COORD_SETS];
00046         bool hasColours;
00047 
00049         Real* pVertices;
00051         Real* pTexCoords[OGRE_MAX_TEXTURE_COORD_SETS];
00053         Real* pNormals;
00055         unsigned long* pColours;
00056 
00058         unsigned short vertexStride;
00060         unsigned short normalStride;
00062         unsigned short texCoordStride[OGRE_MAX_TEXTURE_COORD_SETS];
00064         unsigned short colourStride;
00065 
00067         unsigned short numBlendWeightsPerVertex;
00068 
00074         RenderOperation::VertexBlendData* pBlendingWeights;
00075 
00076 
00077     };
00078 
00081     typedef struct _GeomVector {
00082         Real x;
00083         Real y;
00084         Real z;
00085     } GeomVertexPosition, GeomVertexNormal;
